color.author: Intel Corporation
color.description: Modifies a color changing its luminance.

in_ports.description: Luminance to be applied in the color.
in_ports.name: IN

color.name: color/luminance-rgb

members.description: Initial color, with full luminance. Luminance will vary considering value received on IN port.
members.name: color

out_ports.description: Color with new luminance applied. The value is a multiplication of each component on option and rate between luminance value and its range.
out_ports.name: OUT
